document_data.mainbody:
Unity was a Netherese city during the time of ancient Netheril.
Unity was founded in the early 600s NY (around ) and served to defend against goblins.
Unity was the site for the largest of all temples constructed for the glory of Amaunatorâ€”the Forested Enclave of the Face of the Sun. This towering structure soared 17 stories into the sky and was visible for miles around.
In , Unity was successfully attacked by the bandit lord Olostin, starting his 33 year reign of terror.
In , the city was besieged by extra-planar fiends, who waged a three-year war for the city before being banished or killed by Karsus. 
In the spring of , magically mutated creatures began coming out of the Far Horns Forest near Unity, believed to be caused by Karsuss use of heavy magic during the war against the fiends.
